column3: Dimenze kvality  -  funkčnost - Daum PotPlayer - přehraje formáty - MP4, MKV, AVI, FLAC, MP3, MPG
column4: PotPlayer is a multimedia (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_player_(software) )  software player developed for the Microsoft Windows (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_Windows )  operating system by South Korean Internet company Kakao (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakao )  (formerly Daum Communications). It competes with other popular Windows media players such as VLC media player (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VLC_media_player ) , mpv (media player) (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mpv_(media_player) ) , GOM Player (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GOM_Player ) , KMPlayer (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KMPlayer ) , SMPlayer (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SMPlayer )  and Media Player Classic (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_Player_Classic ) . Initially, the player was released under the name Daum Live.
column11:
1. vytvoříme složku
2. do ní dáme tyto formáty: MP4, MKV, AVI, FLAC, MP3, MPG
3. všechny otevřeme pomocí Daum Potplayeru
column15: Všechny soubory se přehrajou bez přerušení.
